name: Play Playground
address: 3900 S Las Vegas Blvd Luxor Hotel & Casino, Las Vegas, NV 89119
description: Indoor playground with oversized games, interactive challenges, and fun for families and teens.
reviews: Great for families and playful adults!
Lots of fun interactive games and challenges.
The slide and games kept my kids entertained for hours.
Amazing place for a unique family outing.

name: Treehouse Playground
description: Outdoor playground with natural wood structures and safe play areas for young children.
reviews: Perfect for toddlers and young kids.
Safe and well-maintained.
Lots of shade and equipment.
A favorite spot for our family weekends.

name: Exploration Peak Park
address: 9275 S Buffalo Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89178
description: A park with hiking trails, a playground, picnic areas, and stunning views.
reviews: Beautiful hiking and great playground for kids.
We loved the peaceful environment and slide.
Lots of open space for kids to run.
Great family picnic destination.

name: Sky Zone Trampoline Park
address: 9650 S Eastern Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89123
description: Indoor trampoline park with foam pits, dodgeball courts, and ninja warrior courses.
reviews: My kids can jump here for hours.
Clean and well-supervised.
Perfect for rainy or hot days.
Great birthday party venue.

name: Fidgets Indoor Playground & Party Place
address: 7835 S Rainbow Blvd, Ste 15, Las Vegas, NV 89139
description: Indoor playground aimed at kids up to 6 years old, with party spaces available.
reviews: Great indoor play for toddlers.
Fun and clean environment.
Perfect spot for birthday parties.
Friendly staff and safe equipment.

name: Bouncy World
address: 4549 Blue Diamond Road, Las Vegas, NV 89139
description: Indoor inflatable playground with bounce houses, slides, and more for children ages 2-10.
reviews: A fun and safe place for young kids.
Lots of inflatables to keep kids entertained.
Clean and well-staffed.
My kids ask to come back all the time.

name: Kangamoo Indoor Playground
address: 1525 E Sunset Rd, Ste 7, Las Vegas, NV 89119
description: Indoor playground offering soft play equipment, toddler zones, and birthday party services.
reviews: Great for toddlers and preschoolers.
Clean and safe with friendly staff.
Amazing birthday party venue.
Lots of toys and activities for kids.

name: Kidstopia
address: 4215 S Durango Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89147
description: Indoor play space catered to children from toddlers to young teens with diverse play options.
reviews: Perfect spot to burn off energy on hot days.
Lots of activities for multiple age groups.
Great for birthday parties!
Staff is very attentive and helpful.

name: Kids Town
address: 5875 S Rainbow Blvd, Ste 110, Las Vegas, NV 89118
description: Indoor playground with modular play systems and party spaces, suitable for kids up to 12 years old.
reviews: Clean and safe indoor playground.
Kids love the variety of climbing and play options.
Great birthday party location.
Helpful staff and friendly atmosphere.

name: Wally Wombats Indoor Playground
address: 3165 N Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89108
description: Indoor playground offering a fun, safe environment for kids to play and learn.
reviews: Lots of fun activities for all ages.
Clean and well maintained.
Perfect for group birthday parties.
Very welcoming staff.
